languages.text: "Это священная реликвия, передающаяся в культе множество поколений. Лишь Висирю, Первому ткачу, и правой руке его, ткачу второму, дозволено обучаться и использовать сакральные карты в гаданиях. Чтобы направлять путь. Чтобы читать в сплетениях нитей судьбы возможные исходы".

traits.locale_text: "Это священная реликвия, передающаяся в культе множество поколений. Лишь Висирю, Первому ткачу, и правой руке его, ткачу второму, дозволено обучаться и использовать {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}сакральные карты{/g} в гаданиях. Чтобы направлять путь. Чтобы читать в сплетениях нитей судьбы возможные исходы".

languages.text: "It is a holy relic that has been passed down from generation to generation. Only the First and Second Spinners are allowed to study the sacred cards and interpret their meaning. We use His Tarot to guide the cult and discern the tangled threads of fate."
languages.original_text: "Это священная реликвия, передающаяся в культе множество поколений. Лишь Висирю, Первому ткачу, и правой руке его, ткачу второму, дозволено обучаться и использовать сакральные карты в гаданиях. Чтобы направлять путь. Чтобы читать в сплетениях нитей судьбы возможные исходы".

traits.locale_text: "It is a holy relic that has been passed down for many a generation. Only the Vizsier, the First Weaver, and their right hand, the Second Weaver, are allowed to learn how to read the sacred cards. So that they may guide the cult's way. So that they may glimpse the outcomes of possibility in the tangled threads of fate."

"It is a holy relic that has been passed down for many a generation. Only the Vizsier, the First Weaver, and their right hand, the Second Weaver, are allowed to learn how to read the sacred cards. So that they may guide the cult's way. So that they may glimpse the outcomes of possibility in the tangled threads of fate."

"It is a holy relic that has been passed down from generation to generation. Only the First and Second Weavers are allowed to study the sacred cards and interpret their meaning. We use His Tarot to guide the cult and discern the tangled threads of fate."

"It is a holy relic that has been passed down from generation to generation. Only the First and Second Weavers are allowed to study the sacred cards and interpret their meaning. We use His Tarot to guide the cult and discern the tangled threads of fate."

"It is a holy relic that has been passed down from generation to generation. Only the First and Second Spinners are allowed to study the sacred cards and interpret their meaning. We use His Tarot to guide the cult and discern the tangled threads of fate."

"It is a holy relic that has been passed down from generation to generation. Only the First and Second Spinners are allowed to study the sacred cards and interpret their meaning. We use His Tarot to guide the cult and discern the tangled threads of fate."

languages.text: «Se trata de una reliquia sagrada que se ha legado de generación en generación. Solo el Primer y el Segundo Tejedor pueden estudiar las cartas sagradas e interpretar su significado. Usamos Su tarot para guiar al culto y discernir las enmarañadas hebras del destino».
languages.original_text: "It is a holy relic that has been passed down from generation to generation. Only the First and Second Spinners are allowed to study the sacred cards and interpret their meaning. We use His Tarot to guide the cult and discern the tangled threads of fate."

traits.locale_text: «Se trata de una reliquia sagrada que se ha legado de generación en generación. Solo el Primer y el Segundo Tejedor pueden estudiar las cartas sagradas e interpretar su significado. Usamos Su tarot para guiar al culto y discernir las enmarañadas hebras del destino».

languages.text: 「代々受け継がれてきた聖遺物よ。神聖なカードを読み解き、その意味を解釈することを許されるのは、第一の織り手と第二の織り手だけ。教団を導き、運命の糸のもつれを見極めるために、主のタロットを使うの」
languages.original_text: "It is a holy relic that has been passed down from generation to generation. Only the First and Second Spinners are allowed to study the sacred cards and interpret their meaning. We use His Tarot to guide the cult and discern the tangled threads of fate."

traits.locale_text: 「代々受け継がれてきた聖遺物よ。神聖なカードを読み解き、その意味を解釈することを許されるのは、第一の織り手と第二の織り手だけ。教団を導き、運命の糸のもつれを見極めるために、主のタロットを使うの」

languages.text: “这是代代相传的圣物，只有首席与次席织网者才有权研究祂的圣牌，解释牌面的意思。我们会用祂的圣牌来引导教派，辨别纠缠在一起的命运之线。”
languages.original_text: "It is a holy relic that has been passed down from generation to generation. Only the First and Second Spinners are allowed to study the sacred cards and interpret their meaning. We use His Tarot to guide the cult and discern the tangled threads of fate."

traits.locale_text: “这是代代相传的圣物，只有首席与次席织网者才有权研究祂的圣牌，解释牌面的意思。我们会用祂的圣牌来引导教派，辨别纠缠在一起的命运之线。”

languages.text: "Es ist ein heiliges Relikt, das von Generation zu Generation weitervererbt wird. Nur der Erste und der Zweite Spinner dürfen die heiligen Karten studieren und deuten. Wir benutzen Sein Tarot, um den Kult zu leiten und die verschlungenen Fäden des Schicksals zu entwirren."
languages.original_text: "It is a holy relic that has been passed down from generation to generation. Only the First and Second Spinners are allowed to study the sacred cards and interpret their meaning. We use His Tarot to guide the cult and discern the tangled threads of fate."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist ein heiliges Relikt, das von Generation zu Generation weitervererbt wird. Nur der Erste und der Zweite Spinner dürfen die heiligen Karten studieren und deuten. Wir benutzen Sein Tarot, um den Kult zu leiten und die verschlungenen Fäden des Schicksals zu entwirren."

languages.text: « C'est une sainte relique qui se transmet de génération en génération. Seuls les premier et deuxième tisseurs sont autorisés à étudier les cartes sacrées et à les interpréter. Nous nous servons de Son tarot pour guider le culte et démêler l'écheveau de la fatalité. »
languages.original_text: "It is a holy relic that has been passed down from generation to generation. Only the First and Second Spinners are allowed to study the sacred cards and interpret their meaning. We use His Tarot to guide the cult and discern the tangled threads of fate."

traits.locale_text: « C'est une sainte relique qui se transmet de génération en génération. Seuls les premier et deuxième tisseurs sont autorisés à étudier les cartes sacrées et à les interpréter. Nous nous servons de Son tarot pour guider le culte et démêler l'écheveau de la fatalité. »

languages.original_text: "It is a holy relic that has been passed down from generation to generation. Only the First and Second Spinners are allowed to study the sacred cards and interpret their meaning. We use His Tarot to guide the cult and discern the tangled threads of fate."

languages.text: "Deste, nesilden nesle aktarılan kutsal bir yadigârdır. Sadece İlk ve İkinci Dokurların bu kutsal kartlarla çalışıp anlamlarını yorumlamaya yetkisi vardır. O'nun Tarotu'nu tarikata yön verip kaderin dolaşık ipliklerini ayırt etmek için kullanırız."
languages.original_text: "It is a holy relic that has been passed down from generation to generation. Only the First and Second Spinners are allowed to study the sacred cards and interpret their meaning. We use His Tarot to guide the cult and discern the tangled threads of fate."
